allclasses:craftinginfo-allclasses-text:
Welcome to the comprehensive class mod All Classes

This mode offers a choice of 13 new classes, plenty of new traits and items. Here is a description of the properties of each class.
The mod was reworked for Tábor servers
-DejFidOFF-

Alchemyst,
boundaries are meant to be crossed

Abilities:
• Transmutation Exclusively can produce sulfur
• Forager (+25% yield from wild crops, +50% chance for an additional find when gathering)
• Fleetfooted (+10% walking speed)
• Fasting (-20% hunger rate)
• Sluggish (-25% mining speed)


Artisan,
this world is yours to shape.

Abilities:
• Artifice (Has the ability to craft small carpets, also to craft a few paints)
• Pilferer
(+35% loot from cracked containers, chance for a double drop of the sharp wheel, 25% chance to obtain a whole cracked container, -20% hunger rate)
• Rugged (+5 health points)
• Nervous (-50% armor durability, -20% melee damage)


Chef,
you are the master of your food.

Abilities:
• Culinary (Has the ability to craft various metal cooking pots and old-fashioned dried aged beef.)
• Butcher (+25% loot from animals, +50% faster butchering of animals, +50% yield from wild crops, +25% chance for an additional find when gathering)
• Fasting (-20% hunger rate)
• Exhausted (-35% ranged damage, -35% projectile acceleration, -20% ranged accuracy, -30% slower ranged weapons)
• Clumsy (-25% armor durability)


Homesteader,
your fields are full of wealth.

Abilities:
• Pioneer (Can extract seeds from crops, produce fertile soil and universal fertilizer to boost fertility)
• Farmer (+30% extra yield when harvesting planted crops)
• Rugged (+5 health points)
• Butcher (+25% loot from animals, +50% faster butchering of animals, +50% yield from wild crops, +25% chance for an additional find when gathering)
• Petrophobia (No chance to obtain double ore, -25% mining speed)


Lumberjack,
the wilderness is your kingdom and your greatest resource.

Abilities:
• Carpenter (Can craft Sleek Doors, wagon wheels, wallpapers and cheaper firewood, boards, Lumberjack Axe and Sticks)
• Lumberjack (+10% chance for an extra log, double yield from fruit trees, double seed drop rate from trees, +50% chance to obtain twice as many sticks from branches)
• Scavenger (+20% yield from wild crops, +30% chance for an additional find when gathering)
• Rugged (+5 health points)
• Inaccurate (-25% ranged damage, -20% ranged accuracy, -25% range, -15% slower ranged weapons)


Mason,
every construction is your canvas.

Abilities:
• Mason (Produces mortar, plaster, fire-resistant material and other raw bricks at lower cost, can directly produce stone blocks from stones and has access to brown clay bricks.
• Defender (+10% melee damage, +20% armor durability, and +20% less penalty for moving in armor, -20% hunger rate)
• Rockhound (+22.5% additional chance to obtain double ore, +50% mining speed)
• Rugged (+5 health points)
• Heavy-footed (+20% distance at which animals detect you)


Merchant,
you control the economy and that is your kingdom.

Abilities:
• Mercantile (Exclusively can produce Pirate gold coins or rusty gears)
• Sneaky (-60% distance at which animals detect you, +15% walking speed)
• Squeamish (-25% loot from wild animals, -10% slower butchering of animals)


Miner,
the secrets of the rocks are revealed to you.

Abilities:
• Prospector (Produces rock bombs at a lower cost, a primitive recipe for blasting powder, and makes waterproof mine lamps)
• Miner (+50% additional chance to obtain double ore, +100% mining speed)
• Exhausted (-35% ranged damage, -35% projectile acceleration, -20% ranged accuracy, -30% slower ranged weapons)


Mystic,
the secrets of the universe are in your head!

Abilities:
• Transcription (Has the ability to produce small carpets and also parchment from hemp, papyrus, and straw, and can also create a butterfly.)
• Scavenger (+20% yield from wild crops, +30% chance for an additional find when gathering)
• Sneaky (-60% distance at which animals detect you, +15% walking speed)
• Pilferer (+35% loot from cracked containers, chance for a double drop of the sharp wheel, 25% chance to obtain a whole cracked container, -20% hunger rate)
• Careless (No chance to obtain double ore)
• Clumsy (-25% armor durability)


Ranger,
the natural order is your goal.

Abilities:
• Sentry (Has the ability to easily produce a bows and also primitive arrows.)
• Sharpeye (+100% ranged damage, +50% projectile acceleration, +25% faster ranged weapons, most accurate.)
• Defender (+10% melee damage, +20% armor durability, and +20% less penalty for moving in armor, -20% hunger rate)
• Furtive (-25% distance at which animals detect you)
• Squeamish (-25% loot from wild animals, -10% slower butchering of animals)
• Petrophobia (No chance to obtain double ore, -25% mining speed)


Smith,
the ore of the world finds life in your hands.

Abilities:
• Smith (Can use tool sets for repairing armor and shields, create metal pans, and produce cheaper ore bombs and blasting powder)
• Defender (+10% melee damage, +20% armor durability, and +20% less penalty for moving in armor, -20% hunger rate)
• Burner (+35% chance to obtain double wooden coal from wooden kilns)
• Heavyhanded (-20% loot from cracked containers, 20% chance for a lesser find when gathering, -20% yield from wild crops)


Medic,
you bring healing where it is needed most.

Abilities:
• Stitch doctor (Can craft a sewing kit or Tailored armor)
• Field medic (Can craft a Grass and Flower Poultice.)
• Rugged (+5 health points)
• Mender (+25% armor durability)
• Civil (-25% loot from wild animals, -15% slower butchering of animals, 15% chance for a lesser find when gathering, -15% yield from wild crops)


Tinker,
no challenge is too difficult.

Abilities:
• Crafty (Has the ability to craft metal parts and also the ability to create a scrap weapon kit, chute and mechanical parts with higher efficiency)
• Tinkerer Exclusive craftable device to tame locusts
• Technical (Lower cost for repairing translocators, +50% damage against mechanical damage)
• Fleetfooted (+10% walking speed)
• Rockhound (+22.5% additional chance to obtain double ore, +50% mining speed)
• Civil (-25% loot from wild animals, -15% slower butchering of animals, 15% chance for a lesser find when gathering, -15% yield from wild crops)

-enjoy-
allclasses:itemdesc-tools-basic: <font color="#ff9900">Too weak to repair plate armors</font>
allclasses:itemdesc-basicbooster: Permanently increases all max soil nutrient values by 20%
allclasses:itemdesc-qualitybooster: Permanently increases all max soil nutrient values by 40%
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpan-copper: A prospectors pan for better chance to find nuggets
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpan-tinbronze: A proper prospectors pan, can find minerals and has a increased chance to find nuggets
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpan-iron: Super Prospector's Pan, has the highest chance of finding nuggets and much more!
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-copper-fir:
For newbies in the kitchen can cook up to 8 portions.
For cooking food only!
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-bismuthbro:
Advanced bronze cooking pot for max 10 portions.
For cooking food only!
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-iron-fired:
Now we going somewhere! You can cook up to 12 portions.
For cooking food only!
allclasses:block-metalpot-meteoriciron-c: Meteoric iron Pot of Cooked Food
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-meteoricir:
Are you OK? I hope meteor did not hit you. 14 portions now.
For cooking food only!
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-steel-fire:
Oooh yeah you are the Master chef now. You can do up to 16 portions in this pot!
For cooking food only!
game:blockdesc-dirtyclaypot-tinbronze-em:
For people that want to cook much more. You can do up to 10 portions in this pot!
For cooking non-food only!
mod:allclasses
game:block-dirtyclaypot-blackbronze-cook: Black bronze pot with cooked items
game:blockdesc-dirtyclaypot-blackbronze-:
Now this is a cauldron! You can cook up to 20 portions in this pot!
For non-food cooking only!
mod:allclasses
allclasses:block-metalpot-gold-cooked: Gold plated pot of Cooked Food
allclasses:blockdesc-metalpot-gold-fired:
Ha, you've unlocked an endless universe of food. You can make up to 20 servings in this pot!
For cooking food only!
